languages.text: {n}Женщина теряется и ошеломленно бормочет:{/n} "И впрямь... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}Слава{/d} ваша по кораблю разлетелась еще до того, как вы на борт ступили. Получается, нас... обманули? Что же нам теперь делать?"

{n}The woman mutters with a shocked look on her face:{/n} "Yes, of course... Word of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}glory{/d} had reached every deck of this ship even before you arrived on board. So we've been... tricked? What are we supposed to do now?"
languages.original_text: {n}Женщина теряется и ошеломленно бормочет:{/n} "И впрямь... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}Слава{/d} ваша по кораблю разлетелась еще до того, как вы на борт ступили. Получается, нас... обманули? Что же нам теперь делать?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman mutters with a shocked expression,{/n} "Yes, of course... Word of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}glory{/d} had reached every deck of this ship even before you arrived on board. So we've been... tricked? What are we supposed to do now?"

{n}The woman mutters with a shocked expression,{/n} "Yes, of course... Word of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}glory{/d} had reached every deck of this ship even before you arrived on board. So we've been... tricked? What are we supposed to do now?"

{n}The woman mutters with a shocked look on her face:{/n} "Yes, of course... Word of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}glory{/d} had reached every deck of this ship even before you arrived on board. So we've been... tricked? What are we supposed to do now?"

{n}The woman mutters with a shocked look on her face:{/n} "Yes, of course... Word of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}glory{/d} had reached every deck of this ship even before you arrived on board. So we've been... tricked? What are we supposed to do now?"

{n}The woman mutters with a shocked look on her face:{/n} "Yes, of course... Word of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}glory{/d} had reached every deck of this ship even before you arrived on board. So we've been... tricked? What are we supposed to do now?"

{n}The woman mutters with a shocked look on her face:{/n} "Yes, of course... Word of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}glory{/d} had reached every deck of this ship even before you arrived on board. So we've been... tricked? What are we supposed to do now?"

{n}The woman mutters with a shocked look on her face:{/n} "Yes, of course... Word of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}glory{/d} had reached every deck of this ship even before you arrived on board. So we've been... tricked? What are we supposed to do now?"

languages.text: {n}Die Frau murmelt mit entsetzter Miene:{/n} "Ja, natürlich. Das Wissen um Euren {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}Ruhm{/d} hatte bereits alle Decks dieses Schiffs erreicht, ehe Ihr es betreten habt. Wir wurden also ... reingelegt? Was sollen wir jetzt machen?"
languages.original_text: {n}The woman mutters with a shocked look on her face:{/n} "Yes, of course... Word of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}glory{/d} had reached every deck of this ship even before you arrived on board. So we've been... tricked? What are we supposed to do now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Frau murmelt mit entsetzter Miene:{/n} "Ja, natürlich. Das Wissen um Euren {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}Ruhm{/d} hatte bereits alle Decks dieses Schiffs erreicht, ehe Ihr es betreten habt. Wir wurden also ... reingelegt? Was sollen wir jetzt machen?"

languages.text: {n}La femme marmonne, l'air choqué :{/n} « Oui, bien sûr... La rumeur de votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}gloire{/d} s'est répandue sur chaque pont de ce vaisseau avant même votre arrivée à bord. Ainsi nous aurions été... abusés ? Qu'allons-nous faire, à présent ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The woman mutters with a shocked look on her face:{/n} "Yes, of course... Word of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}glory{/d} had reached every deck of this ship even before you arrived on board. So we've been... tricked? What are we supposed to do now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La femme marmonne, l'air choqué :{/n} « Oui, bien sûr... La rumeur de votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}gloire{/d} s'est répandue sur chaque pont de ce vaisseau avant même votre arrivée à bord. Ainsi nous aurions été... abusés ? Qu'allons-nous faire, à présent ? »

languages.text: {n}La mujer masculla con una expresión de asombro en el rostro.{/n} «Sí, por supuesto... Las noticias de su {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}gloria{/d} se habían extendido por todas las cubiertas de esta nave incluso antes de su llegada a bordo. ¿Entonces... nos han engañado? ¿Y ahora qué vamos a hacer?».
languages.original_text: {n}The woman mutters with a shocked look on her face:{/n} "Yes, of course... Word of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}glory{/d} had reached every deck of this ship even before you arrived on board. So we've been... tricked? What are we supposed to do now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer masculla con una expresión de asombro en el rostro.{/n} «Sí, por supuesto... Las noticias de su {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}gloria{/d} se habían extendido por todas las cubiertas de esta nave incluso antes de su llegada a bordo. ¿Entonces... nos han engañado? ¿Y ahora qué vamos a hacer?».

languages.text: {n}女はショックを受けた表情でつぶやく。{/n}「ええ、もちろんです…あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}栄光{/d}については、あなたが乗船される前からこの船の全デッキに届いていました。では、私たち…騙されていたの？これからどうすればいいの？」
languages.original_text: {n}The woman mutters with a shocked look on her face:{/n} "Yes, of course... Word of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}glory{/d} had reached every deck of this ship even before you arrived on board. So we've been... tricked? What are we supposed to do now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}女はショックを受けた表情でつぶやく。{/n}「ええ、もちろんです…あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}栄光{/d}については、あなたが乗船される前からこの船の全デッキに届いていました。では、私たち…騙されていたの？これからどうすればいいの？」

languages.text: {n}女人一脸震惊，喃喃自语起来。{/n}“是啊，当然了……您的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}大名{/d}早在您登船之前，就传遍了这艘船上的所有甲板。也就是说，他们一直在……欺骗我们？我们现在该怎么办？”
languages.original_text: {n}The woman mutters with a shocked look on her face:{/n} "Yes, of course... Word of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}glory{/d} had reached every deck of this ship even before you arrived on board. So we've been... tricked? What are we supposed to do now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}女人一脸震惊，喃喃自语起来。{/n}“是啊，当然了……您的{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}大名{/d}早在您登船之前，就传遍了这艘船上的所有甲板。也就是说，他们一直在……欺骗我们？我们现在该怎么办？”

languages.text: {n}Kadın, yüzünde şaşkın bir ifadeyle gevelemeye başlıyor.{/n} "Evet, tabii ya... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}Şanınız{/d}, siz daha gemiye gelmeden evvel her güvertede duyulmuştu zaten. O hâlde biz... Kandırıldık mı? Ne yapacağız şimdi?"
languages.original_text: {n}The woman mutters with a shocked look on her face:{/n} "Yes, of course... Word of your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Glory}glory{/d} had reached every deck of this ship even before you arrived on board. So we've been... tricked? What are we supposed to do now?"
